AD_WaitingForToast_001.synopsis: The goblins gathered around for the toast. One of the goblins shouts this phrase from time to time when hear Mirg talking about a toast.

AD_WalkingTowardsToastPoint.synopsis: AD where one of the goblins proposes a toast.

AD_ToastIntro.synopsis: Mirg is waiting to make her toast.

AD_Attack.synopsis: The goblins realise that the other goblins died and conclude that it must have been the player.

AD_TooMuchBeer_002.synopsis: The second goblin just died of poison, but the goblin who said this thinks he just drank too much and fell asleep.

AD_ToStations.synopsis: Several goblins died from poisoning. This goblin is ordering the others to get to their battle stations because he/she is afraid of an attack.

AD_SceneWithoutPlayer.synopsis: AD where the goblins toast on their own

AD_TooMuchBeer_001.synopsis: A goblin  just died of poison, but the goblin who said this thinks he just drank too much and that's why he fell down.

AD_WaitingForToast_002.synopsis: The goblins gathered around for the toast. One of the goblins shouts this phrase from time to time when hear Mirg talking about a toast.

AD_WaitingForToast_001_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_WaitingForToast_001_0.context: NodeContext: He's excited for the toast.

AD_WalkingTowardsToastPoint_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_WalkingTowardsToastPoint_0.text: Over here, lads! I propose... a toast!

AD_ToastIntro_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_ToastIntro_0.context: NodeContext: impatiently waiting for everyone to get ready.

AD_ToastIntro_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_ToastIntro_1.text: Shut up, I'm gonna say something!
AD_ToastIntro_1.context: NodeContext: Trying to get the attention from the other goblins.

AD_Attack_0.speaker: Brawler Rot, Warrior Sul, Warlock Gurk, Sharp-Eye Aggy, Tracker Grikka, Tracker Klagga, Tracker Puli, Tracker Tak
AD_Attack_0.context: NodeContext: Panicked and angry - They think the player killed the other goblins

AD_Attack_1.speaker: Brawler Rot, Warrior Sul, Warlock Gurk, Sharp-Eye Aggy, Tracker Grikka, Tracker Klagga, Tracker Puli, Tracker Tak

AD_TooMuchBeer_002_0.text: Another one down?! You pisspots can't 'old your drink. Shameful.
AD_TooMuchBeer_002_0.context: NodeContext: This goblin is laughing at the goblins who just fell down. Heavily slurred even as he lambasts his friends for being drunk. (A belch in there somewhere might be nice)

AD_ToStations_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy, Warrior Sul, Tracker Tak, Brawler Rot, Tracker Puli, Warlock Gurk, Tracker Grikka, Tracker Klagga
AD_ToStations_0.text: Someone's killing us off - battle stations!

AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_2.text: A toast! To our victory, and many more to come!

AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_1.text: To tha' duke's face when we gave 'im to the drow!

AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_0.speaker: Warlock Gurk
AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_0.text: To findin' those looters and crushin' 'em!

AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_3.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
AD_SceneWithoutPlayer_3.context: NodeContext: Last toast made, can be very enthusiastic.

AD_TooMuchBeer_001_0.text: Fallin' down already? What are ya, a bloody gnome?
AD_TooMuchBeer_001_0.context: NodeContext: The goblin is laughing incredulously at the other goblin who just died, because s/he thinks he just fell asleep because he was a lightweight.
